mapper.insert: insert into replyboard(memId, questionNo, content) value (#{memId}, #{questionNo}, #{content});
mapper.select: select replyNo, questionNo, vote, content, replyboard.memId, memberPhoto from replyboard join member on replyboard.memId = member.memberId where questionNo = #{param};
mapper.update: update replyboard set content='삭제된 답변입니다.', title='삭제된 질문입니다.', memId='알 수 없는 사용자' where replyNo = #{param};
